name: Re:Flection
description:
Welcome to Re:Flection's Prototype testing!

Escape the abyss and ascend towards the heaven to find out what kind of fate awaits you...

Current Patch 0.1.0!! - 12/11/2022

Content:

  • 10 different spells
  • 4 enemy types
  • 2 pickups
  • 1 stage
  • Supports controller

Discord: https://discord.gg/uVhvWTWKRJ

Feedback form: https://forms.gle/oaniiuVYbGN3KfmN6

Bug report form: https://forms.gle/p75kE9ubuhLy2Y266

AVAILABLE LANGUAGE OPTIONS:            

-English

Video/Stream Content: Please feel free to record or stream this game however you'd like as an independent creator! 

This game is currently for Windows PC only. We may look into macOS and Linux sometime in the future, but not anytime soon. Our small team wants to focus on new content and bug fixing first and foremost at this time.
